prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit XHTML
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit XHTML

section.p: XHTML (Extensible HyperText Markup Language), is a markup language that has the same expressive possibilities as HTML, but a stricter syntax. XHTML is an application of XML. XHTML is a W3C standard.
XHTML is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs.
